            module HasGeoSalt
          
      4. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    4. 
            
              1

      5.

    6. 
            
              1
            

            

              included do
          
      7. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    7. 
            
              1
            

            

                GEO_SALT_SIZE = 0.002
          
      8. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    8. 
            

            

            
          
      9. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    9. 
            
              1

                def apply_salt!

    14. 
            
              163
            

            

                  self.lonlat_with_salt_geojson = lonlat_with_geo_salt(lonlat_geojson)

      16.

                def lonlat_with_geo_salt(source_point)
          
      18. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    18. 
            
              163
            

            

                  return nil unless source_point
          
      19. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    19. 
            

            

            
          
      20. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    20. 
            
              163
            

            

                  return source_point
          
      21. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    21. 
            

            

            
          
      22. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    22. 
            

            

                  point = JSON.parse(source_point)
          
      23. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    23. 
            

            

                  point['coordinates'].map! do |value|
          
      24. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    24. 
            

            

                    value + GEO_SALT_SIZE * rand(-50..49) / 100.0
          
      25. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    25. 
            

            

                  end
          
      26. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    26. 
            

            

                  point.to_json
          
      27. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    27. 
            

            

                end
          
      28. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    28. 
            

            

              end
          
      29. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    29. 
            

            

            end
          
      30.

    27. 
            

            

                          geo_salt: true, custom_fields: custom_fields(public_only: true), phone: non_personal_phone,
          
      28. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    28.

      29.

      32.

                def non_personal_address

                  non_personal_address = [target.city, target.district, target.street]

                  non_personal_address.push(target.house) if target.apartment.present?

                def non_personal_phone
          
      78. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    78. 
            
              14
            

            

                  phone = target.phone
          
      79. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    79. 
            
              14
            

            

                  masked_phone = phone.gsub(/\d/, '*')
          
      80. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    80. 
            
              14
            

            

                  return masked_phone if phone.size < 5
          
      81. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    81. 
            

            

            
          
      82. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    82. 
            
              14
            

            

                  left, right = phone.size > 7 ? [2, 2] : [1, 1]
          
      83. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    83. 
            
              14
            

            

                  "#{phone[0..left]}#{masked_phone[(left + 1)..(-right - 1)]}#{phone[-right..-1]}"

    84.

                def distance_label
          
      91. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    91. 
            
              25
            

            

                  distance = target.try(:distance)
          
      92. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    92. 
            
              25
            

            

                  return '' unless distance
          
      93. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    93. 
            

            

            
          
      94. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    94. 
            

            

                  if distance > 2000
          
      95. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    95. 
            

            

                    "#{(distance / 1000).round} км"
          
      96. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    96. 
            

            

                  elsif distance > 1000
          
      97. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    97. 
            

            

                    "#{(distance / 1000).round(1)} км"
          
      98. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    98. 
            

            

                  elsif distance > 100
          
      99. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    99. 
            

            

                    "#{(distance.to_i / 100).round * 100} м"
          
      100. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    100.

      101. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    101. 
            

            

                    "#{(distance.to_i / 10).round * 10} м"

      103.

                def build_custom_value(custom_field, custom_values)
          
      125. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    125. 
            

            

                  value = custom_values.find { |cv| cv.custom_field == custom_field }.try(:value)

    126. 
            

            

                  case custom_field.data_type

                  value == '1'

                def build_phone_value(value)

      27.

                            lonlat: render_lonlat(target.lonlat_with_salt_geojson), distance: distance_label,
          
      28.

      33.

                          )

                  def full_data

                  def full_address

                  def detailed_full_address

                  def non_personal_address
          
      73. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    73. 
            
              3
            

            

                    non_personal_address = [target.city, target.district, target.street]
          
      74. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    74. 
            
              3
            

            

                    non_personal_address.push(target.house) if target.apartment.present?
          
      75. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    75. 
            
              3
            

            

                    non_personal_address.compact.join(' ')

    78. 
            
              1
            

            

                  def non_personal_phone
          
      79. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    79. 
            
              3
            

            

                    phone = target.phone
          
      80. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    80. 
            
              3
            

            

                    masked_phone = phone.gsub(/\d/, '*')
          
      81. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    81. 
            
              3
            

            

                    return masked_phone if phone.size < 5
          
      82. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    82. 
            

            

            
          
      83. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    83. 
            
              3
            

            

                    left, right = phone.size > 7 ? [2, 2] : [1, 1]
          
      84. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    84. 
            
              3
            

            

                    "#{phone[0..left]}#{masked_phone[(left + 1)..(-right - 1)]}#{phone[-right..-1]}"
          
      85. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    85. 
            

            

                  end
          
      86. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    86. 
            

            

            
          
      87.

                  def detailed_non_personal_address

                    { city: target.city, district: target.district, street: target.street, house: target.apartment.blank? && target.house || nil, apartment: nil }

    89. 
            

            

                  end
          
      90.

                  def distance_label
          
      92. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    92. 
            
              4
            

            

                    distance = target.try(:distance)
          
      93. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    93. 
            
              4
            

            

                    return '' unless distance
          
      94. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    94. 
            

            

            
          
      95. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    95. 
            

            

                    if distance > 2000
          
      96. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    96. 
            

            

                      "#{(distance / 1000).round} км"
          
      97. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    97. 
            

            

                    elsif distance > 1000
          
      98. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    98. 
            

            

                      "#{(distance / 1000).round(1)} км"
          
      99. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    99. 
            

            

                    elsif distance > 100
          
      100. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    100. 
            

            

                      "#{(distance.to_i / 100).round * 100} м"
          
      101. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    101. 
            

            

                    else
          
      102. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    102. 
            

            

                      "#{(distance.to_i / 10).round * 10} м"
          
      103. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    103. 
            

            

                    end
          
      104. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    104. 
            

            

                  end
          
      105. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    105. 
            

            

            
          
      106. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    106. 
            
              1
            

            

                  def custom_fields(public_only: false)
          
      107. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    107. 
            
              4
            

            

                    custom_values = target.custom_values

      111. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    111. 
            

            

                        nil
          
      112. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    112. 
            

            

                      # We skip address custom field as we use address fields instead

      114.

                        nil

    115.

      118.

                  def build_custom_value(custom_field, custom_values)
          
      122. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    122. 
            

            

                    value = custom_values.find { |cv| cv.custom_field == custom_field }.try(:value)
          
      123. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    123. 
            

            

                    case custom_field.data_type
          
      124. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    124. 
            

            

                    when 'checkbox'
          
      125. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    125. 
            

            

                      build_checkbox_value(value)
          
      126. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    126. 
            

            

                    when 'phone'
          
      127. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    127. 
            

            

                      build_phone_value(value)
          
      128. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    128. 
            

            

                    else
          
      129. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    129. 
            

            

                      value
          
      130. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    130. 
            

            

                    end
          
      131. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    131. 
            

            

                  end
          
      132. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    132. 
            

            

            
          
      133. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    133. 
            
              1
            

            

                  def build_checkbox_value(value)
          
      134. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    134. 
            

            

                    value == '1'
          
      135. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    135. 
            

            

                  end
          
      136. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    136. 
            

            

            
          
      137. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    137. 
            
              1
            

            

                  def build_phone_value(value)
          
      138. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    138. 
            

            

                    JSON.parse(value) unless value.blank?
          
      139. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    139. 
            

            

                  end
          
      140. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    140. 
            

            

            
          
      141. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    141. 
            
              1
            

            

                  def activated_days_ago(value)
          
      142. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    142. 
            
              4
            

            

                    value.nil? ? 0 : (Date.today - value).try(:to_i)

    143. 
            

            

                  end
          
      144. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    144. 
            

            

                end
          
      145. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    145. 
            

            

              end
          
      146. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    146. 
            

            

            end

                def submitted_scope(scope)

    app/searchers/text_searcher.rb

            class TextSearcher

              def search_fields

              def apply_search(scope)
          
      11. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    11. 
            
              4
            

            

                str = search_params[:search]
          
      12. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    12. 
            
              4
            

            

                return scope if str.blank?
          
      13. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    13. 
            

            

            
          
      14. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    14. 
            

            

                base_scope = scope.dup
          
      15. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    15. 
            

            

                search_fields.each_with_index do |field, index|
          
      16. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    16. 
            

            

                  str.split(' ').compact.each_with_index do |word, word_index|
          
      17. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    17. 
            

            

                    query = "CAST(#{field} AS TEXT) ILIKE concat('%', ?, '%')"
          
      18. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    18. 
            

            

                    scope = if index.zero? && word_index.zero?
          
      19. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    19. 
            

            

                              scope.where(query, word)
          
      20. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    20. 
            

            

                            else
          
      21. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    21. 
            

            

                              scope.or(base_scope.where(query, word))
          
      22. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    22. 
            

            

                            end
          
      23. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    23. 
            

            

                  end
          
      24. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    24. 
            

            

                end
          
      25.

              describe 'POST /api/v2/help_requests/:id/submit' do
          
      147. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    147. 
            
              2
            

            

                let!(:help_request) { create :help_request, :assigned, volunteer: user, creator: moderator, organization: organization, score: 4 }
          
      148. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    148. 
            
              2
            

            

                let(:score_result_after_submit) { user.score + help_request.score }
          
      149. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    149. 
            

            

            
          
      150. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    150. 
            
              1
            

            

                it 'submits HelpRequest record' do
          
      151. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    151. 
            
              1
            

            

                  volunteer = help_request.volunteer

      159.

                context 'when periodic HelpRequest' do

                  let!(:help_request) do

                context '8: when moderator creates help request, volunteer submits it, then moderator adds recurring in X adter N days' do

                def moderator_creates_help_request(help_request_params = {})
          
      372. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    372. 
            
              13
            

            

                  help_request = HelpRequest.new
          
      373. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    373. 
            
              13
            

            

                  help_request.organization = moderator.organization
          
      374. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    374. 
            

            

            
          
      375. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    375. 
            

            

                  params = {
          
      376. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    376. 
            
              13
            

            

                    help_request: default_help_request_params.merge(help_request_params)
          
      377. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    377. 
            

            

                  }
          
      378. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    378. 
            

            

            
          
      379. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    379. 
            
              13
            

            

                  Admin::HelpRequestCases::Create.new(
          
      380. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    380. 
            

            

                    help_request, build_params(params), moderator
          
      381. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    381. 
            

            

                  ).call
          
      382. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    382. 
            

            

            
          
      383. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    383. 
            
              13
            

            

                  raise help_request.errors.messages.to_json unless help_request.valid?
          
      384. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    384. 
            

            

            
          
      385. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    385. 
            
              13
            

            

                  help_request
          
      386. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    386. 
            

            

                end
          
      387.

      388. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    388. 
            
              1

                def moderator_blocks_help_request(help_request)
          
      403.

                  params = {

      406.

                  }

      416.

      421.

                def delay_in_days(days)
          
      440. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    440. 
            
              14
            

            

                  Timecop.travel(Time.zone.now + days.days)
          
      441. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    441. 
            

            

                end
          
      442. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    442. 
            

            

            
          
      443. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    443. 
            
              1
            

            

                def check_does_not_reactivate(help_request)
          
      444. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    444. 
            
              10
            

            

                  old_volunteer_id = help_request.volunteer_id
          
      445. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    445. 
            
              10
            

            

                  old_state = help_request.reload.state
          
      446. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    446. 
            
              10
            

            

                  perform
          
      447. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    447. 
            
              10
            

            

                  expect(help_request.reload.state).to eq(old_state)
          
      448. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    448. 
            
              10
            

            

                  expect(help_request.volunteer_id).to eq(old_volunteer_id)
          
      449. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    449. 
            

            

                end
          
      450. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    450. 
            

            

            
          
      451. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    451. 
            
              1
            

            

                def check_reactivates(help_request)
          
      452. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    452. 
            
              3
            

            

                  perform
          
      453. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    453. 
            
              3
            

            

                  expect(help_request.reload.state).to eq('active')
          
      454. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    454. 
            
              3
            

            

                  expect(help_request.volunteer).to be_nil
          
      455. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    455. 
            

            

                end
          
      456. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    456. 
            

            

            
          
      457. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    457. 
            
              1
            

            

                def build_params(hsh)
          
      458. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    458. 
            
              40
            

            

                  ActionController::Parameters.new(hsh)
          
      459. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    459. 
            

            

                end
          
      460. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    460. 
            

            

              end
          
      461. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    461. 
            

            

            end
          
      462.
